title: The Modern Observability Roundtable: AI, Rising Costs and OpenTelemetry
author: Adam LaGreca
description: in a distributed world of microservices, it’s simply not possible to set up monitors on everything that matters; we need the ability to deal with unexpected situations and react accordingly.
cntitle: 现代可观测性圆桌会议：人工智能、不断上涨的成本和 OpenTelemetry
cndescription: 在微服务的分布式世界中，为所有重要事项设置监控是不可能的；我们需要有能力处理意外情况并做出相应的反应。
